body:
Klapperen =========

Light weight text based chatbot by ultrazoid_


Current Version: (CODE) dev 1.2

News

  • If there are any people who are looking at collaborating with me on this could they please contact me.
  • I am currently looking for people to create the tranlations of the responses once the std library has been made this will be in *.csv format
  • I am also looking for ideas for responses etc. to include in the library
  • The current English Library can be found here.

Current Known Issues and Solutions:

WOO! There are currently no KNOWN issues. If you have an issue please post it under the issues tab.

Version List

For more info please check the Change Log
  • (CODE) dev 1
    • (CODE) dev 1.1
    • (CODE) dev 1.2
name: Klapperen
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
